text:
[Verse]
Woke up with a smile yea
Sunshine fills the sky now
No more rainy days hey
Just feel the good vibes oh

[Verse 2]
Laughter in the park wow
Butterflies all around
Skipping down the street yea
Happiness abound oh

[Chorus]
Oh sunny days they’re here to stay
No clouds to chase our fun away
Oh sunny days let's dance and play
Feel the warmth in every ray

[Verse 3]
Ice cream in our hands now
Music in the air sweet
Every step a beat yea
Moments pure and rare oh

[Verse 4]
Friends all gather round yea
Singing till the night comes
Memories we make now
Underneath the bright sun

[Chorus]
Oh sunny days they’re here to stay
No clouds to chase our fun away
Oh sunny days let's dance and play
Feel the warmth in every ray
title: Sunny Days
